[center][font size=4]Jackett Change Log[/font][/center] [b]26.01.2016:[/b] Initial Release.
Container.Name: jackett
Container.Description: Jackett is a proxy server translating queries from apps like Sonarr etc into tracker-site-specific http queries parsing the html response and sending results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping & translation logic removing the burden from other apps.[br] [br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Storing all jackett config files [br] [b]/downloads[/b] : Point to blackhole location[br]
Container.Overview: Jackett is a proxy server translating queries from apps like Sonarr etc into tracker-site-specific http queries parsing the html response and sending results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping & translation logic removing the burden from other apps.
